inclusion.criterion: Outpatient and have a compensated HF, without hospitalizations in the last three months;
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Present functional class II and III (New York Heart Association);
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Have not suffered myocardial infarction in the last three months;
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: No previous diagnosis of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (FEV1 / FVC ratio> 70% in spirometry);
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Does not present any clinical disease or restriction of osteomioarticular or neurological origin that prevents / limits the carrying out of the proposed tests;
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Integral cognitive functions, which were evaluated by the cognitive test of Leganés -
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Acute atrial fibrillation or total atrioventricular block;
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Systemic blood pressure (AP) at uncontrolled rest (≥ 180/110 mmHg or ≤80 / 40mmHg);
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Resting heart rate (HR) ≤ 40 bpm or ≥ 120 bpm;
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on 5L home oxygen. Cardiology consult recommended a right heart cath for evaluation of response to sildenafil but the patient refused.
